articles.title: The Western Cape records most new Covid-19 cases on Christmas Day - News24
articles.description: Although South Africa's fourth wave of Covid-19 infections started in Gauteng, cases in that province are decreasing. Instead, the Western Cape and KwaZulu-Natal are seeing increases.
articles.content:
• South Africa recorded 14 828 new Covid-19 cases on Christmas Day.
  • Most of the cases were recorded in the Western Cape.
  • The positivity rate decreased from 29.4% to 25.7%.
